product_name: Hi-Tec West Ridge Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Take the Hi-Tec West Ridge Waterproof Hiking Shoes out on your favorite trails, rain or shine. Their waterproof uppers and rugged outsoles are built for adventure. Suede and high-performance nylon upper has a waterproof bootie built in that keeps water out. Lightweight and durable high-performance shank ensures the right degree of flexibility and stability. Ghillie and double-eyelet lacing creates a secure fit. Thermoplastic rubber heel arm ensures a secure heel lock, even during the most arduous trails. Moisture-wicking lining keeps feet dry. Ortholite insole delivers long-lasting cushioning, anti-odor and antimicrobial properties, all of which ensure all-day comfort. Additional layer of underfoot cushioning sandwiched between the footbed and midsole for improved comfort on rough trails. Rugged rubber outsole provides good traction. Closeout.
short_description: Take the Hi-Tec West Ridge Waterproof Hiking Shoes out on your favorite trails, rain or shine. Their waterproof uppers and rugged outsoles are built for adventure.
